summary: Drupal 5.0 function name dictionary for Ctrl-X Ctrl-K completition
name: Drupal-5.0-function-dictionary
description: This is just a dictionary for Drupal developers, to make their life a bit easier. If you add it to the dictionary list in vim, you can use the Ctrl-X Ctrl-K completition in INSERT mode.
install_details:
1. Download the dict and place in ~/.vim/dictionaries/
2. Put this line into your .vimrc:
    set dict+=~/.vim/dictionaries/drupal50-functions.dict
